search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for webCRM (webcrm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for webCRM is available at: [https://webcrm.com/pricing/](https://webcrm.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Flexible CRM Pricing Plans, Try Free | webCRM

*   [Visit the efficy corporate site](https://www.efficy.com/fi/)
*   [Contact us](https://webcrm.com/contact-us/)
*   [Customer Service](https://webcrm.com/customer-service/)
*   [Login](https://login.webcrm.com/)

Breadcrumb

1.  [Home](https://webcrm.com/)
2.  Pricing

Find your perfect fit.
======================

Simple CRM, simple pricing.

Starter

29€ user/month

\*Minimum 2 users

Ready-to-use CRM for small businesses and startups that helps you connect with more customers, lock in more sales, and simplify all your processes.

*   Easy-to-use email
*   Management of sales opportunities
*   Analytics & Reports

[START FREE TRIAL](https://webcrm.com/free-trial/)

Popular

SMB

55€ user/month

\*Minimum 2 users

Easy-to-implement, configurable CRM that helps you generate more high-quality leads and effectively manage your pipeline to scale faster.

*   Multi-channel Lead Management
*   Email Marketing
*   Advanced Pipeline Management
*   Integrations
*   Web forms

[START FREE TRIAL](https://webcrm.com/free-trial/)

Enterprise

69€ user/month

\*Minimum 5 users

Complete CRM that helps you better track and manage your activities, save time and resources, and brings your teams together to drive impact.

*   Advanced CRM  
*   Delivery Phase Management
*   Time Management  
*   Support Module  
*   Email events tracking 

[START FREE TRIAL](https://webcrm.com/free-trial/)

**All our CRM plans include:**

![Image 33](https://webcrm.com/sites/default/files/2024-04/Vector.svg)

Activities

![Image 34](https://webcrm.com/sites/default/files/2023-03/sales-automation.svg)

Sales

![Image 35](https://webcrm.com/sites/default/files/2023-07/icon-feature-marketing-email.svg)

Email

![Image 36](https://webcrm.com/sites/default/files/2023-07/icon-feature-dashboard.svg)

Dashboards

![Image 37](https://webcrm.com/sites/default/files/2024-04/gdpr-inverted_0.svg)

GDPR

![Image 38](https://webcrm.com/sites/default/files/2023-03/agenda.svg)

Agenda

Need help choosing a plan?
--------------------------

[Talk to an expert](https://webcrm.com/contact-us/ "Contact us")

Customise your solution with seamless integrations.
---------------------------------------------------

From ERP solutions to easy-to-use open API for all your custom needs.

 ![Image 39](https://webcrm.com/sites/default/files/styles/full_width/public/2024-06/integrations-webcrm.png.webp?itok=cWlC_n62)

[See all integrations](https://webcrm.com/integrations/ "Integrations")

Start increasing your sales today with webCRM.
----------------------------------------------

See how easy it is — try 14 days now for free. No credit card or installation needed.

[TRY webCRM FOR FREE](https://webcrm.com/free-trial/ "Free Trial")

Join 20,000+ happy users worldwide.
-----------------------------------

 ![Image 40](https://webcrm.com/sites/default/files/styles/full_width/public/2024-05/customer-logos-desktop-en.png.webp?itok=s9okd-md)

Start small and upgrade your business with webCRM. Check out our CRM plans and prices to get started today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Minimum user requirements apply for each tier.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Ready-to-use CRM for small businesses and startups that helps you connect with more customers, lock in more sales, and simplify all your processes.
Easy-to-implement, configurable CRM that helps you generate more high-quality leads and effectively manage your pipeline to scale faster.
Complete CRM that helps you better track and manage your activities, save time and resources, and brings your teams together to drive impact.
